text: Uzbekistan competed at the 1998 Winter Olympics in Nagano, Japan. ==Alpine skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !Race 1 !Race 2 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Time !Time !Rank |- |Komil Urunbayev |Slalom |align="center"|1:09.55 |align="center"|1:09.30 |align="center"|2:18.85 |align="center"|28 |} ==Figure skating== Tatyana Malinina placed eighth in ladies figure skating and Roman Skornyakow placed nineteenth in men's."Figure Skating in Uzbekistan". _Figure Skating in Uzbekistan_. title: Uzbekistan at the 1998 Winter Olympics
